author: joeyaiello
body: Talked about this in today's team meeting. In addition to the reference/scaffolding assemblies we're building in #3095, we should publish the runtime 6.0 assemblies to Nuget (in addition to MyGet).

comments.author: Mattacks
joeyaiello
comments.body:
@Mattacks looks like you found #6475, so I'm going to close this one as a dupe.

No ETA unfortunately, but it is still high in our queue pending some more urgent work.

title: Publish runtime 6.0 assemblies to Nuget
